sentences.en: A cry of anguish burst from her lips.
sentences.cn: 她突然痛苦地大叫了一声。

sentences.en: A shared anguish can be a bridge of reconciliation.
sentences.cn: 共同的痛楚能成为和解的桥梁.

sentences.en: And in their anguish, they both forgot the nearness of my bedroom.
sentences.cn: 极度的痛苦让他们忘记我的卧室就在附近。

sentences.en: And we know of your anguish.
Every line etched on her face told a story of personal anguish.
sentences.cn: 她脸上的每条皱纹都讲述了一次痛苦的经历。

sentences.en: For a few brief minutes we forgot the anxiety and anguish.
sentences.cn: 短短几分钟我们就忘记了焦虑与苦恼。

sentences.en: He bellows, rends the air with anguish.
sentences.cn: 他咆哮着，痛苦的喊声划破长空。

sentences.en: His anger and anguish clearly went deep.
sentences.cn: 他的愤怒和痛苦显然是深切而强烈的。

sentences.en: Mark looked at him in anguish.
No one suspected the anguish he carried on his shoulders.
sentences.cn: 没人觉察出他所承担的痛苦。

sentences.en: She cried out for anguish at parting.
sentences.cn: 分手时,她由于痛苦而失声大哭.

sentences.en: She senses that behind the clowning there is a terrible sense of anguish.
sentences.cn: 她感觉到在这种滑稽可笑行为的背后隐藏着极大的痛苦。

sentences.en: She suffered the anguish of despair.
the anguish of not knowing what had happened to her
sentences.cn: 由于不知道她发生了什么事而痛苦不堪

sentences.en: The anguish was so great that it turned into madness.
sentences.cn: 痛苦如此之大,以至变作疯狂.

sentences.en: The existentialists say at once that man is anguish.
sentences.cn: 存在主义者立刻说,人类是痛苦.

sentences.en: The old woman beat her breast and cried in anguish.
sentences.cn: 这个老妇人伤心地捶胸顿足地哭着、号着.

sentences.en: The unspeakable anguish wrung his heart.
sentences.cn: 难言的痛苦折磨着他的心.

trans.tran_en: mental or physical suffering caused by extreme pain or worry
